activities: Rimini Street is the leading third-party provider of enterprise software support services.  Rimini Street uses personal information that it receives from the EU (name, company name, email, phone) primarily to respond to prospective EU customers who request a quote, request more information or ask us to contact them regarding Rimini Street services.   We may also use personal information we receive from the EU for customer support activities such as providing technical support and improving service offerings.  Rimini Street also uses such personal information for marketing activities as permissible under applicable law.
contacttitle1: GVP, Global Human Resources, Security, Riak & Compliance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe Dispute Resolution Program for unresolved complaints not involving HR; EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for unresolved complaints involving HR.
